CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells (PCEs)
2. Polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives
3. BT / BO derivatives
4. Organic Field Effect Transistors (OFETs)
5. OFETs based on BT - containing polymers
6. BT - containing polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BT / BO derivatives
2. BT - containing polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BT / BO derivatives |
| BT - containing polymers |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies) of polymer solar cells incorporating BT/BO derivatives have reached 6-7 %.
2. Hole mobilities of OFETs (Organic Field-Effect Transistors) based on BT-containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V-1 s^-1.

So, the property values mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PCEs (6-7 %)
2. Hole mobilities (1 cm^2 V-1 s^-1)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies): 6-7 %
2. Hole mobilities: 1 cm^2 V-1 s^-1

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the values of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies): 6-7 % |
| Hole mobilities: 1 cm^2 V-1 s^-1 |
